Manlove]]'''.<ref>{{CG|C}}, p. 689</ref><ref name=TB>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=61425|articlename=Modern Fantasy: Five Studies. 1975|dated=|website=TB|accessed=22 January 2012}}</ref>

*'''Subject:''' Discussion of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.
*'''Publication:''' Quotes from the letter appeared in ''[[Modern Fantasy: Five Studies]]''.
